summary.span: 实现文本控件要求的基本功能。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality required by text controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类实现的文本操作控件的核心功能，如和。This class implements the core features of text manipulation controls, such as and . 其中包括文本选择**剪贴板**功能、 多行文本框控件支持和多个事件。These include text selection, **Clipboard** functionality, multiline text control support, and many events. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用、 一个派生类中，以创建多行具有垂直滚动条控件。The following code example uses , a derived class, to create a multiline control with vertical scroll bars. 此示例还使用， ，和属性，以使多行文本框控件可用于创建文本文档。This example also uses the , , and properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在多行文本框控件中按 Tab 键时，是否在控件中键入一个 Tab 字符，而不是按选项卡的顺序将焦点移动到下一个控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether pressing the TAB key in a multiline text box control types a TAB character in the control instead of moving the focus to the next control in the tab order.

value.span: 如果用户可以使用 Tab 键在多行文本框控件中输入 Tab 字符，则为 ；如果按 Tab 键移动焦点，则为 。

span.span: if users can enter tabs in a multiline text box using the TAB key; if pressing the TAB key moves the focus.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性必须也是`true`控件中获取一个制表符。The property must also be `true` to get a TAB character in the control. 如果属性设置为`true`，用户必须按 CTRL + TAB 将焦点移到下一个控件的 tab 键顺序。If the property is set to `true`, the user must press CTRL+TAB to move the focus to the next control in the tab order. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用、 一个派生类中，以创建多行具有垂直滚动条控件。The following code example uses , a derived class, to create a multiline control with vertical scroll bars. 此示例还使用， ，和属性，以使多行文本框控件可用于创建文本文档。This example also uses the , , and properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此方法将文本添加到而不是使用连接运算符 （+） 将文本串联起来控件中的现有文本到属性。You can use this method to add text to the existing text in the control instead of using the concatenation operator (+) to concatenate text to the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法和属性将文本从一个到另一个。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method and the property to copy text from one to another. 此示例需要两个控件分别命名为，`textBox1`并`textBox2`，已添加到窗体，并且`textBox1`具有文本分配给其属性。This example requires that two controls named, `textBox1` and `textBox2`, have been added to a form and that `textBox1` has text assigned to its property. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当更改分配给控件的字体时，是否自动调整控件的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the height of the control automatically adjusts when the font assigned to the control is changed.

value.span: 如果在更改字体时自动调整控件的高度，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the height of the control automatically adjusts when the font is changed; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您将设置属性设置为`true`有关，当更改，扩大或收缩以容纳更大或较小的文本。When you set the property to `true` for a , when the changes, the expands or contracts the to accommodate the larger or smaller text. 的不会更改。The of the does not change. 如果你想要更改控件的大小，如用户输入的文本，则可以使用控件，并使用其事件以更改其大小。If you want to change the size of the control as the user enters text, you can use a control and use its event to change its size. ## Examples 此示例假定你已具有两个文本框中，两个按钮的窗体，并为每个按钮单击事件。This example assumes that you have a form with two text boxes, two buttons, and click events for each of the buttons. 示例演示了属性设置为`true`一个文本框和`false`其他。The example demonstrates the property by setting it to `true` for one text box and `false` for the other. 单击一个按钮时文本框中将填入较小的文本，并单击其他按钮时文本框中将填入较大的文本。When you click one button the text boxes are filled with a smaller text, and when you click the other button the text boxes are filled with larger text. 具有文本框设置为`true`将增加高度以容纳更大的文本。The text box that has set to `true` expands in height to accommodate the larger text. 宽度不会更改。The width does not change. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用属性来更改要混合到窗体的配色方案的文本控件的背景色。You can use the property to change the background color of the text control to blend into the color scheme of your forms. 若要更改控件中文本的颜色，请使用属性。To change the color of the text within the control, use the property. 设置时属性的文本控件，请确保你选择的颜色不会导致要消失的控件的文本。When setting the property of your text control, ensure that the color you choose does not cause the text of the control to disappear. 例如，如果并属性均设置为`Color.Black`，textbox 控件中的文本将不可见。For example, if the and properties are both set to `Color.Black`, the text within your textbox control will not be visible. 此属性可能会替代如果的属性设置为`true`。This property might be over ridden if the property of the is set to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用属性来创建无边框和平面样式的控件，除了默认的三维控件。You can use the property to create borderless and flat style controls, in addition to the default three-dimensional control. > [!NOTE] > 派生的类中， ，不支持`BorderStyle.FixedSingle`样式。The derived class, , does not support the `BorderStyle.FixedSingle` style. 此样式将导致若要使用`BorderStyle.Fixed3D`改为设置样式。This style will cause the to use the `BorderStyle.Fixed3D` style instead. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用，派生类中，以创建可以正确显示具有单个边框使用 20 磅 arial 字体的文本的文本框。The following code example uses , a derived class, to create a text box that can properly display text using 20-point Arial with a single border. 此示例使用属性以确定该字体后的相应控件的高度和已分配给控件。This example uses the property to determine the appropriate height of the control after the font and have been assigned to the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此方法返回`true`，可以调用方法来撤消在文本框中的最后一个操作。If this method returns `true`, you can call the method to undo the last operation in a text box. 可以使用此方法在的事件，或在管理上的按钮的状态的代码中启用或禁用可以撤消在文本框控件中的前一操作。You can use this method in the event of a , or in code that manages the state of buttons on a to enable or disable the ability to undo the previous operation in a text box control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用、 派生的类。The following code example uses , a derived class. 它提供了事件处理程序对象执行的剪切、 复制、 粘贴和撤消操作。It provides event handlers for objects that perform Cut, Copy, Paste, and Undo operations. 此示例需要名为控件`textBox1`已创建。This example requires that a control named `textBox1` has been created. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此方法以清除的分配，而是控制内容属性为空字符串。You can use this method to clear the contents of the control instead of assigning the property an empty string. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用、 一个派生类中，以创建事件处理程序事件。The following code example uses , a derived class, to create an event handler for the event. 事件处理程序中的代码将数据限制为数字。The code within the event handler restricts data to numbers. 已在控件中输入文本后，代码将确定输入的文本是否为数字。After text has been entered in the control, the code determines if the text entered is a number. 如果文本不是数字，则代码将清除从控件的文本和一个显示来提醒用户接受仅数字。If the text is not a number, the code clears the text from the control and a is displayed to alert the user that only numbers are accepted. 该示例需要`Boolean`名为变量`flag`和一个控件调用`textBox1`此方法的外部定义。The example requires that a `Boolean` variable named `flag` and a control called `textBox1` are defined outside of this method. 此示例演示如何使用标记变量以避免级联事件中的事件。This example demonstrates how to use a flag variable to avoid a cascading event in the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用属性来更改要与你的窗体上的其他控件的文本匹配的控件中文本的颜色。You can use the property to change the color of the text within the control to match the text of other controls on your form. 此属性还可用于突出显示包含无效的值的特定文本框。You can also use this property to highlight a specific text box that contains an invalid value. 若要更改控件的背景色，请使用属性。To change the background color of the control, use the property. 设置时属性的文本控件，请确保你选择的颜色不会导致要消失的控件的文本。When setting the property of your text control, ensure that the color you choose does not cause the text of the control to disappear. 例如，如果并属性均设置为`Color.Black`，textbox 控件中的文本将不可见。For example, if the and properties are both set to `Color.Black`, the text within your textbox control will not be visible. 此属性可能会替代如果的属性设置为`true`。This property might be over ridden if the property of the is set to `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在指定的位置`pt`参数是控件的字符串中指定的点与最接近的第一个字符的工作区以外`pt`返回。If the location specified in the `pt` parameter is outside the client area of the control, the first character of the string closest to the point specified in `pt` is returned. 此方法可用于确定在控件内的特定点附近找到的字符。You can use this method to determine which characters are located near a specific point within the control. 然后可以使用此值在该位置的文本上执行操作。You can then use this value to perform operations on the text at that location. > [!NOTE] > 如果在指定的位置`pt`参数位于控件中指定的点与最接近的字符串的最后一个字符的工作区右侧`pt`返回。If the specified location in the `pt` parameter is located on the right side of the client area of the control, the last character of the string closest to the point specified in `pt` is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回与指定的位置最接近的字符索引`pt`参数。This method returns the character index that is closest to the position specified in the `pt` parameter. 字符索引是文本的在控件中，包括空格的从零开始索引。The character index is a zero-based index of text in the control, including spaces. 此方法可用于确定在文本中用户在其上将鼠标放到此方法传递鼠标坐标。You can use this method to determine where in the text the user has the mouse over by passing the mouse coordinates to this method. 这很有用，如果你想要在用户将鼠标指针停留在控件文本中的单词时执行任务。This can be useful if you want to perform tasks when the user rests the mouse pointer over a word in the text of the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果指定的位置不在该控件的客户端矩形内，或不在控件中的最后一个字符，则返回值是最后一个字符的索引。If the specified location is not within the client rectangle of the control, or is beyond the last character in the control, the return value is the index of the last character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从零开始的行号在文本框中。Line numbering in the text box starts at zero. 如果`lineNumber`参数是否大于在文本框中的最后一行返回-1。If the `lineNumber` parameter is greater than the last line in the text box, returns -1. 返回物理行的第一个字符索引。 returns the first character index of a physical line. 物理行是显示的行，而不是分配行。The physical line is the displayed line, not the assigned line. 显示的行数可能会超出分配由于自动换行的行数。The number of displayed lines can be greater than the number of assigned lines due to word wrap. 例如，如果将分配到两个较长的行控件，并设置并到`true`，两个已分配的长行产生四个物理 （或显示行）。For example, if you assign two long lines to a control and set and to `true`, the two long assigned lines result in four physical (or displayed lines).

span.span: The value of the parameter is less than zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可确定基于中指定的字符索引的行号`index`方法的参数。This method enables you to determine the line number based on the character index specified in the `index` parameter of the method. 控件中的文本的第一行返回值为零。The first line of text in the control returns the value zero. 方法返回的物理行号的索引的字符所在的位置在控件内。The method returns the physical line number where the indexed character is located within the control. 例如，如果文本中的第一个逻辑行的一部分控件换行到下一行方法返回 1，如果指定的字符索引处的字符具有换行到第二个物理行。For example, if a portion of the first logical line of text in the control wraps to the next line, the method returns 1 if the character at the specified character index has wrapped to the second physical line. 如果设置为`false`、 行的任何部分被换到下一步，并且该方法返回对指定的字符索引为 0。If is set to `false`, no portion of the line wraps to the next, and the method returns 0 for the specified character index. 此方法可用于确定哪一行是位于特定的字符索引。You can use this method to determine which line a specific character index is located within. 例如，在调用方法可搜索的文本，可以获取到找到搜索结果的位置的字符的索引。For example, after calling the method to search for text, you can obtain the character index to where the search results are found. 您可以调用此方法返回的字符索引与找不到方法来确定单词的哪一行。You can call this method with the character index returned by the method to determine which line the word was found. > [!NOTE] > 如果在中指定的字符索引`index`参数不在可用的控件内包含的行数，则返回最后一个行号。If the character index specified in the `index` parameter is beyond the available number of lines contained within the control, the last line number is returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数组中的每个元素将成为文本框控件中的文本行。Each element in the array becomes a line of text in the text box control. 如果的文本框控件的属性设置为`true`和换行字符将显示在文本中，添加到数组中的新元素并显示在单独的行换行字符后面的文本。If the property of the text box control is set to `true` and a newline character appears in the text, the text following the newline character is added to a new element in the array and displayed on a separate line. > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下，线条的集合是只读的副本中的行的。By default, the collection of lines is a read-only copy of the lines in the . 若要获取行的可写集合，请使用类似于以下代码： `textBox1.Lines = new string[] { "abcd" };`To get a writable collection of lines, use code similar to the following: `textBox1.Lines = new string[] { "abcd" };` ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用、 一个派生类中，以从多行文本框控件中提取的文本的所有字符串并将它们显示使用方法。The following code example uses , a derived class, to extract all strings of text from a multiline text box control and displays them using the method. 此示例需要创建控件后，名为`textBox1`，并且它已填充的文本行。This example requires that a control has been created, named `textBox1`, and that it has been filled with lines of text. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要将文本输入控件中的值，例如邮政编码和电话号码的长度限制或限制时，数据将在数据库中输入输入文本的长度，可以使用此属性。You can use this property to restrict the length of text entered in the control for values such as postal codes and telephone numbers, or to restrict the length of text entered when the data is to be entered in a database. 您可以限制到数据库中的相应字段的最大长度输入到控件的文本。You can limit the text entered into the control to the maximum length of the corresponding field in the database. > [!NOTE] > 在代码中，可以设置的值属性的长度大于指定的值的值属性。In code, you can set the value of the property to a value that has a length greater than the value specified by the property. 此属性只影响在运行时输入到控件的文本。This property only affects text entered into the control at run time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类中， ，以创建用来接受密码的文本框。The following code example uses the derived class, , to create a text box that is used to accept a password. 此示例使用属性以将所有字符都更改为大写形式指定类型和属性将密码长度限制为八个字符。This example uses the property to change all characters typed to uppercase and the property to restrict the password length to eight characters. 此示例还使用center 中的密码属性控件。This example also uses the property to center the password in the control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于确定用户是否已修改的文本框控件的内容。You can use this property to determine if the user has modified the contents of the text box control. 此外可以在代码中以指示进行了更改到文本框控件由应用程序设置此属性。You can also set this property in code to indicate that changes were made to the text box control by the application. 此属性可以验证和节省数据的方法，用于确定是否因此可以验证所更改的内容，或将其保存在一个文本框控件中进行了更改。This property can be used by validation and data-saving methods to determine if changes were made in a text box control so the changed contents can be validated or saved. 如果您更改属性以编程方式属性会恢复为`false`。If you change the property programmatically, the property reverts to `false`. 这不会引发事件。This does not raise the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用事件、 派生的类，以确定的内容控制控件填充数据后发生了变化。The following code example uses the event for a , a derived class, to determine if the contents of the control have changed since the control was filled with data. 该示例使用字符串来存储控件的原始内容并将其内容与比较以确定是否已更改内容。The example uses a string to store the original contents of the control and compares it against the contents of the to determine if the contents have changed. 如果内容已更改，属性设置为`true`。If the contents have changed, the property is set to `true`. 否则，它将重置为`false`。Otherwise, it is reset to `false`. 此示例需要名为控件`textBox1`已创建并且`String`名为变量`originalText`已创建，以存储的原始文本控件。This example requires that a control named `textBox1` has been created and that a `String` variable named `originalText` has been created to store the original text for the control. span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is a multiline text box control.

value.span: 如果该控件是多行文本框控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control is a multiline text box control; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多行文本框中，可在控件中显示多个文本行。A multiline text box allows you to display more than one line of text in the control. 如果属性设置为`true`，多行文本框中输入的文本换行到控件中的下一行。If the property is set to `true`, text entered into the multiline text box is wrapped to the next line in the control. 如果属性设置为`false`，多行文本框控件中输入的文本将显示在同一行，直到输入换行字符。If the property is set to `false`, text entered into the multiline text box control will be displayed on the same line until a newline character is entered. 以下可作为换行符：The following can be used as newline characters: - - ControlChars.CrLfControlChars.CrLf - vbCrLf (仅限 Visual Basic)vbCrLf (Visual Basic only) 可以将滚动条添加到文本中使用属性来显示水平和/或垂直滚动条。You can add scroll bars to a text box using the property to display horizontal and/or vertical scroll bars. 这允许用户滚动浏览扩展到控件的尺寸之外的文本。This allows the user to scroll through the text that extends beyond the dimensions of the control. > [!NOTE] > 因为默认值属性是`false`的默认大小即使调整大小将是根据字体大小。Because the default value of the property is `false`, the default size of a will be in accordance with the font size even if you resize the . 若要获取相同的大小为你，请将其属性设置为`true`。To get a consistent size for your , set its property to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 在日语操作系统中，如果属性设置为`true`，并设置属性将显示该密码，从而危及系统安全的文本。On Japanese operating systems, if the property is set to `true`, setting the property will display the text of the password, thus compromising system security. 因此，在日语操作系统上设置属性设置为`false`如果你设置属性。Therefore, on Japanese operating systems, set the property to `false` if you set the property. > [!NOTE] > 此属性设置为`false`默认情况下，所有派生类中，除控件。This property is set to `false` by default for all derived classes, with the exception of the control. 有关控件，属性影响是否该控件将自动调整大小，按如下所示：For a control, the property affects whether or not the control will automatically resize, as follows: - 如果设置为`true`并设置为`true`，将不会自动调整大小。If is set to `true` and is set to `true`, will not automatically resize. - 如果设置为`true`并设置为`false`，将自动调整大小。If is set to `true` and is set to `false`, will automatically resize. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用、 一个派生类中，以创建多行具有垂直滚动条控件。The following code example uses , a derived class, to create a multiline control with vertical scroll bars. 此示例还使用， ，和属性，以使多行文本框控件可用于创建文本文档。This example also uses the , , and properties to make the multiline text box control useful for creating text documents. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 将控件内容滚动到当前插入符号位置。

span.span: Scrolls the contents of the control to the current caret position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使您滚动控件的内容，直到插入符号是控件的可见区域内。This method enables you to scroll the contents of the control until the caret is within the visible region of the control. 如果插入点定位该控件的可见区域方法将会滚动控件的内容，直到在该控件的底部显示插入符号。If the caret is positioned below the visible region of the control, the method will scroll the contents of the control until the caret is visible at the bottom of the control. 如果插入点位于控件的可见区域的上方，此方法将滚动控件的内容，直到在控件顶部显示插入符号。If the caret is positioned above the visible region of the control, this method scrolls the contents of the control until the caret is visible at the top of the control. 可以在多行文本框中使用此方法以确保当前文本入口点是该控件的可见区域内。You can use this method in a multiline text box to ensure that the current text entry point is within the visible region of the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果控件不具有焦点，或者已在控件的可见区域中放置插入符号，则此方法无效。This method has no effect if the control does not have focus or if the caret is already positioned in the visible region of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用枚举和方法以确保文本插入点，由插入符号，表示始终在屏幕上可见后按 ENTER 键。The following code example demonstrates how to use the enumeration and the method to ensure that the text insertion point, represented by the caret, is always visible on the screen after the ENTER key has been pressed. 若要运行该示例，请将以下代码粘贴在一个窗体，其中包含控件称为`TextBox1`和一个控件调用`RichTextBox1`。To run the example, paste the following code in a form containing a control called `TextBox1` and a control called `RichTextBox1`. 此示例需要已与关联的事件处理方法事件。This example requires that the event-handling method has been associated with the event.
